My name is Leonid

What can I do for you
HTML5
It creates the framework of your website or application, and the fifth version will allow me to create a more SEO-optimized structure of your product
CSS3
This style language allows me to create absolutely any appearance of your site or application. Everything is limited only by your imagination!
Java Script
This programming language allows you to animate anything: sliders, windows, tooltips, tabs, getting data from the server, and much more
Jquery
The Jquery library will speed up development. We won't integrate it into the project without the need, but we have the skill to work with it.
React
This library allows you to create web applications. We can create the most interactive product exactly for your goals
Node.js
This platform allows you to create a backend for your product - " brains” that will perform actions that the user does not see
Mongo.db
This is not a relational database that will store your site or application data
